creator: Ovidiu Pop

Do you love driving cars? Driving School Sim, the latest driving simulator will allow you to feel what driving a real car is! Driving School Sim allows you to get behind the wheel of the newest cars on the market!

Drive sport cars, SUVs, Sedans, Supercars, Hypercars and Hatchbacks!
It will teach you to drive a manual transmission with clutch and stick shift or keep it simple with the automatic gearbox.

Play with the virtual steering wheel or many other control options that suit your needs. Improve your road rules knowledge with this amazing driving simulator.

Huge maps are waiting to be explored: famous cities, mountain roads, desert landscapes and icy and snowy streets, etc...

Play with your friends in new free ride Online Multiplayer mode or Race against them in the new multiplayer system!

Career levels, Learning Modes, Events, Races and much more!

Show off your driving skills, get your driving license now! Play Driving School Sim!

title: Driving School Simulator

container.value: Strada Danton, 21, Satu Mare (Satu Mare), Romania

creator: Ovidiu Pop
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to "Driving School Simulator", a true car driving simulator where you can experience the thrill of driving in a variety of open world maps with over 150+ realistic and detailed cars.

Get behind the wheel of your favorite car and drive it in one of the most important cities in the world.
Unique in the car games niche, Driving School Simulator has all the elements that you are searching for….Car collection, City maps, Highway, Customizations, Multiplayer, Drag Race, Challenges, City Driving, Free. It goes on and on. Stop reading, just download now!

In this car simulator , you can learn how to legally drive, participate in street racing,drag racing or invite a friend and drive around the city together.


GAMEPLAY

In this game, you will learn all the traffic signs and regulations while driving your favorite car.You will be required to stop at stop signs, give way to pedestrians, cyclists, cars, and drive safely while obeying traffic rules.

MAPS

With several open world maps to choose from you can drive your car in the city, on the highway or just cruising on long roads. You can choose between Paris, Las Vegas, Sydney, Washington, Rome, Moscow, Route 66 , etc

MULTIPLAYER

Play with your friends in the new Online Multiplayer mode or Race against them. You can create a friends list, chat with them and for sure, race them all ! Challenge your friends in multiple modes available like drag racing, chase mode or street car racing.

TUNING

This car game has more than 150 vehicles to drive. You can choose from sports cars, SUVs, Offroad cars, Sedans, Supercars, Hypercars and Hatchbacks!
You can modify suspension and camber adjustments to improve vehicle handling and appearance or upgrade your car performance to win all the races! Detailed vehicle interiors with customizable ambient lighting await your personal touch.

DRIVE
